talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, actually...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Can you explain to me what this is all about?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$The Woman’s Story$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I know you’re upset, but please open it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Don’t tell me he sent all this...
Hah. Take them back.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey, don’t cry. You’re putting me in a difficult position.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
If he thinks he can get away with these presents, he’s absolutely mistaken.
He doesn’t understand my feelings at all…… (Sobs)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Exactly. So just take them.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Oh, yes. Sniff.
{user_nick}, you have nothing to do with all this drama... Sob.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(I don’t know what I should say. Couples…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Sob... Logan is so cunning.
He knows I can’t refuse if he does this.
But this is what makes me angry!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Oh Joanna, do you understand my feelings of having to listen to a couple whining about their problems?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
He decides everything on his own and he only informs me when he has made the final decision!
I really wanted to solve things together with him.
Logan knows nothing! He probably doesn’t understand my feelings.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So please take these so that I can leave. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(PLEEEASE!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
What’s the use complaining to you.
I’m sorry you had to get involved. This is all because of Logan.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(What am I doing here?)</FONT> Just take a look for the sake of his efforts.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Ah... I know I shouldn’t do this…
But if Logan doesn’t understand my feelings, I won’t accept his gifts!
I’m sorry, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don’t… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(I’m single!! I hate the both of you!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Although I’m reluctant to accept them, I’ll just take a look for your sake, {user_nick}.
But if the gifts don’t make me feel any better, I’m afraid I can’t accept them.
You know how I feel... don’t you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Stop! Joanna, you’re rude too!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Don’t tell me… {user_nick}, have you always been sin...g...le...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I hate couples!)</FONT></html>
<html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Should I just leave?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Really?! I never knew such a person existed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Wait awhile)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
I’m sorry, {user_nick}. I didn’t know you were single... Anyway, I think I was being too selfish.
I’ll take a look at what Logan sent. Please hold on a second.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you crying? Why?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
(Joanna glances at what’s inside the box and her eyes are filled with tears.
Tears start streaming down her cheeks as she reads the letter that was enclosed.)
Ah... Sob....

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Really? <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Why is she crying?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Sniff. He didn’t mean to make me upset.
I... I think I understand what Logan was thinking now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah, I see. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(That was so easy.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
I thought he just didn’t care about my feelings but it wasn’t that.
He just couldn’t find the right time to tell me about what was on his mind. I didn’t know that and all I did was say mean things to him...
I feel like an idiot. Sob...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It seems like you’re touched so I’ll make a leave now.<FONT color=#7e12d2>(I don’t want to get involved anymore…)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Sob.... Sob....

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Please don’t tell me... No....)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Wait! Sob... I feel so bad right now.
I shouldn’t have been so angry with him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah, I see. Okay, I’m off now...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
I want to give him a present that can convey my feelings to him.
I can’t let him leave like this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Handsome what? She was almost cursing him just now!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Oh, kind-hearted {user_nick}.
Please help me get a memorable gift for my handsome boyfriend.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, of course!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Are you listening?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I was only answering your question of whether I was listening…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Aww, thank you, {user_nick}. I knew you wouldn’t refuse.
Have you been to Chiron Beach? You can find special glowing shells there.
You can find them in different colours. Please get the yellow one for Logan.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah... Nevermind. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(It’s hard to turn her down now.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Did I hear it wrongly?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I hope someone understands my feelings too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Thank you so much. Now I can rest assured that his heart won’t be so heavy when he leaves.

$Logan$
How’s Joanna?
Is she still upset with me?

$Joanna$
I wonder if my love is all right. He must be upset because of me.
(Joanna talks to herself)

$Logan$
How’s Joanna?
Is she still upset with me?

$Joanna$
I’m embarrassed that I’m doing this only now, but I hope my sincerity will reach him.
I feel too ashamed to talk to him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Urgh. Here. I’m going to get my hands off this matter now so the two of you settle whatever is left.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Phew, I was waiting for you. How did it go?
Where’s Joanna?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Joanna wanted me to give this to you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Give me what? What did Joanna say?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(My... my what??)</FONT> Yeah, your lovey dovey love.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
It’s from my love?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, I got that for you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Ah, thank you. This is a shell that glows in the dark…
And it’s yellow... which has the meaning of “I will wait for you”... I’m touched.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why did I put in so much effort to help them? Why!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
Ah, Joanna~~ My lovely Joanna~~~
(It looks like Logan can no longer hear what {user_nick} is saying.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What... <FONT color=#7e12d2>(My one and only what...?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Logan$
My one and only darling love, Joanna.
I will miss you. Thank you for understanding my feelings.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hahaha……</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Joanna$
Sob... Logan, my love! I’m sorry.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Receive reward.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Logan$
(Logan and Joanna are passionately embracing each other after staring intently into each other’s eyes.)

journal.title: Feeling Upset
journal.contents:
Listen to how Joanna is feeling.

Merca’s Port - Joanna
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Joanna at Merca’s Port.

journal.title: Farewell Present
journal.contents:
Find the glow-in-the-dark shell at Chiron Beach so that Joanna can give it to Logan as a farewell present.
The shell must be yellow.

Merca’s Port - Chiron Beach
journal.todo_msg: Find glow-in-the-dark shells at Chiron Beach.

journal.title: Oh, Couples
journal.contents:
Take Joanna’s gift to Logan.

Merca’s Port - Logan
journal.todo_msg: You have obtained the yellow glow-in-the-dark shell. Talk to Logan at Merca’s Port.
